snippet: Colorado Rockies Manager Jim Tracy resigned on Sunday, stepping down after the team set a franchise record for losses.
abstract: Colorado Rockies manager Jim Tracy resigns after team finished last in the National League West this year while going 64-98.
lead_paragraph: Colorado Rockies Manager Jim Tracy resigned on Sunday, stepping down after the team set a franchise record for losses.

headline.seo: Manager Jim Tracy Resigns From Rockies
